Manager

Class MovieManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manager.DataManager
      • Manager.MovieManager

  • public class MovieManager
extends DataManager
    Represents the MovieManager of MoblimaApp that handles the creating, updating, removing of movies.
    Since:
    2017-11-16

      • getInstance

        public static MovieManager getInstance()
        To create one instance of the MovieManager if it does not exists else it will return the instance of MovieManager that already exists.
        Returns:
        instance The instance of MovieManager that is already created.

      • checkMovieExistence

        public boolean checkMovieExistence(java.lang.String title)
        This method checks if a particular movie is already in the list.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the movie to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if exists, else false.

      • addMovie

        public Movie addMovie(java.lang.String title,
                      java.lang.String showingStatus,
                      java.lang.String synopsis,
                      java.lang.String director,
                      java.lang.String cast)
        This method adds a new movie while taking in the movie listing details.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the movie.
        showingStatus - The current showing status of the movie.
        synopsis - The synopsis of the movie.
        director - The director of the movie.
        cast - At least two casts of the movie.
        Returns:
        Movie The newly created movie object.

      • removeMovie

        public boolean removeMovie(Movie movie)
        This method performs the removing of a movie based on the inputed movie object.
        Parameters:
        movie - The movie object to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if deletion is successful, else false.

      • getMovieObject

        public Movie getMovieObject(java.lang.String title)
        This method returns the movie object by matching the object with the inputed movie title.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of movie object to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Movie The movie object of matching title.

      • generateTotalSales

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> generateTotalSales()
        This method aggregate the sales of each movie and stores in a hash map.
        Returns:
        rankedMovieHash. Hash map that contains all the movies and their corresponding total sales.

      • rankByRatings

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> rankByRatings(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> overallRatingsList)
        This method ranks the movies by ratings.
        Parameters:
        overallRatingsList - The list consisting of the overall ratings of all movies.
        Returns:
        rankedMoviesRatingsList List that contains the movie titles based on the overall ratings with the highest as the first index.

      • save

        public boolean save()
        This method saves the movieList to the file path.
        Returns:
        true if save is successful, else false.
